text: Kreator is a German thrash metal band from Essen. They formed in 1982 as Tormentor and are counted to the big three German thrash metal bands together with Sodom and Destruction. == Discography == * Endless Pain (1985) * Pleasure to Kill (1986) * Terrible Certainty (1987) * Extreme Aggression (1989) * Coma of Souls (1990) * Renewal (1992) * Cause for Conflict (1995) * Outcast (1997) * Endorama (1999) * Violent Revolution (2001) * Enemy of God (2005) * Hordes of Chaos (2009) * Phantom Antichrist (2012) * Gods of Violence (2017) * Hate Ãœber Alles (2022) == Other websites == * Official website * Official MySpace page * Artist page at Allmusic * Sinister Online interview with Mille Petrozza == References == Category:1982 establishments in Germany Category:1980s German music groups Category:1990s German music groups Category:2000s German music groups Category:2010s German music groups Category:Essen Category:German heavy metal bands Category:Musical groups established in 1982 Category:Thrash metal bands
title: Kreator
